text:
Are you often wondering about the correct
preposition in a place expression?
Are  you uncertain whether you should say at university or in university,
or, to the shop or into the shop?
Then join me in this lesson for a review of prepositions in place expressions.
Hello and welcome everyone this is Minoo at Anglo-Link.

Today, we're going to review
prepositions in place expressions.

I'm sure you know by now that the key to
learning the correct preposition is oral repetition.

So, in this lesson I'm going to give you
a few quick tips and then take you

straight into an active exercise to jog your
memory about prepositions of place.

You must repeat the exercise several
times until you get the preposition right each time.
By the end of your practice, you will have built the necessary

reflexes to use these propositions
correctly every time.
So, when you ready, we can begin!
